question: Umurongo mugari wera udacagaguye ushobora gucibwa ku muhanda kugirango  ugaragaze ibi bikurikira:
Icyapa kitwa Ntihanyurwa mu byerekezo byombi gifite ubuso bw'amabara akurikira

options: Umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga ashobora kunyuranaho arenze umurongo wera  udacagaguye
Umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga abujijwe kunyuranaho arenze imirongo yera
Abayobozi b'ibinyamitende gusa bemerewe kunyuranaho barenze umurongo wera  udacagaguye
question: Mu gihe utwaye ikinyabiziga uva kuri A ugana kuri B, Iki kimenyetso kiri mu  muhanda kivuze iki ?

options: Birabujijwe ku binyabiziga bitwara abakozi ba leta
Birabujijwe ku binyabiziga by'abikorera ki giti cyabo
question: Iki cyapa gisobanura iki ?
Hagati y'imodoka ziherekeranije mu butumwa zigamije urugendo rumwe hagomba  kuba metero zingahe?
Iki cyapa gisobanura iki?

Ahari hejuru cyane y'ubuso bumurika h'amatara ndanga mbere na ndanga nyuma,  ntihashobora kuba aharenze metero 1 na santimetero 90 hejuru y'ubutaka, iyo  ikinyabiziga kidapakiye ku byerekeye utugarurarumuri ubwo buhagarike ntibushobora  kurenga

Uretse ku byerekeye imihanda irombereje y'ibisate byinshi n'imihanda y'imodoka, igice  cy'umuhanda kiri hakurya y'umurongo mugari wera udacagaguye ucibwa ku muhanda  ngo ugaragaze inkombe mpimbano, kigenewe ibi bikurikira

options: A na B ni ibisubizo by' ukuri
question: Iyo ikinyabiziga gihagaritswe n'ijoro ku buryo abayobozi bakigana badashobora  kumenya ko kibabereye imbogamizi, kigomba kurangirwa kure n'ikimenyetso  cyabigenewe kiri ahantu hagaragara kugirango kiburire hakiri kare abandi bayobozi  baza bagisanga, ariko ntibireba ibinyabiziga bikurikira:

options: ibinyabiziga bifite ubugari burenga m 2 na cm 10
question: Ibinyabiziga bikurikira bigomba kugira itara ry'ubururu rimyatsa riboneka mu mpande  zose:
Ijambo akagarurarumuri bivuga akantu karabagirana gasubiza imirasire y'urumuri :

options: humisha ikinyabiziga giturutse mu kindi cyerekezo ucana amatara maremare.
Egera kunkombe y'iburyo bw'umuhanda nibinashobioka ugabanye umuvuduko
Canira amatara ikinyabiziga kiva mukindi cyerekezo
Ongera umuvuduko kugira ngo usohoke mururwo rumuri vuba bishoboka
question: N'iki umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga yakora aramutse ahumishijwe n'urumuri rw'amatara  yikinyabiziga giturutse mu kindi cyerekezo?

options: Biremewe kunyuranaho ariko nturenge umurongo wera ucagaguye
Umuyobozi abujijwe kurenga umurongo wera ucagaguye cyeretse mugihe  bitateza icyago
question: Iki cyapa gisobanura iki?

options: Ongera umuvuduko kugira ngo umutange gukata mbere ye
question: N'iki umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga yakora ashaka gukatira iburyo?
Ugeze ahari inzira yabanyamaguru barindiriye kwambuka. Ntibatangiye kwambuka ,  wakora iki?
Icyapa kivuga icyerekezo gitegetswe kigizwe n'ikirango cy'ibara :

options: Umuhanda urombereje w'ibice byinshi ku birometero 50
Intera nto ntarengwa ya metero 50 hagati y'ibinyabiziga
Umuvuduko ntarengwa ugarukira ku birometero 50 mu isaha
question: Iki cyapa gisobanura iki ?

options: Gushaka umuntu uri hanze y'ikinyabiziga ukuyobora
question: Niki wakora igihe utabona neza usubira inyuma ?

options: Tanga inzira ku binyabiziga bigenda mu muhanda munini wegera
Tanga inzira ku ibinyabiziga biturutse iburyo bwawe
question: Iki cyapa gisobanura iki mu nkomane?

options: Akaba yera cyangwa asa n'umuhondo imbere
Aba ari umutuku cyangwa umuhondo inyuma
Ibiri haruguru byose ni ibisubizo by'ukuri
question: Amatara ndanga mbere n'aya ndanga nyuma y'imodoka zitarengeje metero 6  z'uburebure na metero ebyiri z'ubugari habariwemo imitwaro kandi ntakindi  kinyabiziga kiziritseho, ashobora gusimburwa n'amatara yo guhagarara umwanya  munini, iyo ibyo binyabiziga bihagaze umwanya muto cyangwa munini mu nsisiro bibangikanye ku ruhande rw'umuhanda, ayo matara arangwa n'amabara akurikira
